page.title: 03MAD JACK'S
page.content:
This place is called Mad Jack's because a man called{John Mytton}did crazy things. For example he once{rode {a bear}down a dinner table and set fire to himself to get rid of hiccups. He also tried to jump a five bar gate with two horses and a carriage. He was one of{Shropshire's and England's most {famous eccentrics.
Two brothers jointly own{MAD JACKS. {One of the brothers lives in Yew Tree {House}which is on the premises.The other brother lives in{LLANGOLLEN.}Yew Tree House, which was previously a farmhouse, was built in 1884. All the outbuildings, such as the cow shed, have now been converted into restaurants, bars and lounge bars.
